quest.name: Hungry Hungry Hamsa
journal:
 Quest Sync
Vishrahd is looking at you impatiently.

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: You must be the substitute hamsa-keeper. Well, you're late! Feeding time was supposed to start bells ago! And a hungry hamsa is a noisy hamsa, as you can hear for yourself.

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: What're you standing around for? Are you going to leave those poor creatures to starve to death? Get to work! Chop-chop!

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: Here you go─one large feed bag, and one small. Hamsa of different stature have different diets, you see. And they're finicky eaters, to boot.

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: The smaller ones require only a simple mix of greens and grains. But our big boys also need a helping of silkworm pupae for extra protein. The foodstuffs are next to that wooden crate over there. Now get to it!

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: How many times do I have to explain it? The smaller hamsa only get greens and grains. The larger hamsa get silkworms as well. The foodstuffs are over there by the crate. Now, chop-chop!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Which bag will you scoop the grain into?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The small feed bag.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The large feed bag.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Neither.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Which bag will you scoop the silkworms into?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: The small feed bag.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: The large feed bag.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Neither.

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Which bag will you scoop the vegetable scraps into?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: The small feed bag.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: The large feed bag.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Neither.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Dispose of the feed bag's contents?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Empty the small feed bag.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Empty the large feed bag.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Keep the bags as they are.

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to discard the contents of your feed bag?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: That particular food is already in your feed bag.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You unceremoniously heap feed into your bag.

dialogue.name: SYSMES
dialogue.text: The hamsa flaps its wings and its eyes light up with gastronomic delight!

dialogue.name: SYSMES
dialogue.text: The hamsa shuns the bag and stares blankly skyward as if forsaken by the gods. Perhaps the feed mix is wrong?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The hamsa stares off happily into space, its belly sated.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The hamsa is eyeing you expectantly...

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: Done already? Perhaps you're not as hopeless as you look. But you'd better be on time for the next feeding. Er, what was your name again?

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: Forename? Wait, you don't mean... That Forename!? The adventurer who rescued Matsya from the beasts!?

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: My most sincere apologies! I never imagined a hero like you would simply be walking amongst us...and slopping the hamsa, besides! Heavens, my face must be so red right now...

dialogue.name: VISHRAHD
dialogue.text: Anyhow, er...I thank you for a job well done. Here's your pay for today's work. Now, I'd best hunt down the real substitute hamsa-keeper.
